title: Lightweight Deep Learning for Fog Monitoring and Traffic Safety Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical solution design capabilities to address fog-related traffic accidents in complex terrains.

learning_goals: Learners can explain image preprocessing steps using fog density distribution map generation and high-frequency component extraction techniques.
Learners can implement fog density prediction methods using the three-branch structure of the lightweight deep learning model ABNet.
They can evaluate and improve edge computing optimization models operating in constrained computing environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
